content:
>> I somehow duplicated Morning Coffee 135. So I've skipped 136 to make up for it.

Thats the trouble w/ those pesky integer IDs.. but i guess 'Morning Coffee {7FF763AB-1553-4e95-BC6F-67028122172E}' just doesnt have the same ring to it...

> given that much (all?) of TR1 is lifted from Boost

There are some largish (e.g. around unordered containers) changes and lots in the details between Boost and TR1, so "much" is right here.

> make Virtual Server work with it

As an aside, have you seen this http://blogs.msdn.com/virtual_pc_guy/archive/2008/01/04/running-virtual-pc-under-hyper-v-beta.aspx ... running VPC under a guest under Hyper-v? I can see everyone getting very lost very quickly :-)
West Virginia lost to Pitt- not Penn. If they lost to Penn, they would have a hard time making a case for being in the top 50 teams, much less number one.
